publisher.publisher-name: Larousse et le Département de littérature française de l'université Paris-8

title-group.article-title: Penser l'histoire antique au XIIIesiècle à la lumière de l'historiographie contemporaine

abstract.p: Reading the anonymous 13th century works Le Roman de Troie en prose (Prose I) and Les Faits des Romains with a modem critical perspective highlights their ambiguous status and generic ambivalence at a time when history was even more uncertain of its disciplinary particularities, and et the same time indicates the longstanding nature of the history/story dialectic.
